constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 2 (Monday, January 4, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. COMER:
H.R. 26
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Clause l of Section 8 of Article 1--``The Congress shall
have Power To lay and collect Taxes, Duties, Imposts and
Excises, to pay the Debts and provide for the common Defence
and general Welfare of the United States; but all Duties,
Imposts and Excises shall be uniform throughout the United
States''
=========================== NOTE ===========================
January 4, 2021, on page H51, the following appeared: By Mr.
COMER H.R. 26. Congress has the power to enact this legislation
pursuant to the following: By Mr. COMER H.R. 26 Congress has the
power to enact this legislation pursuant to the following: Clause
l of Section 8 of Article 1--``The Congress shall have Power To
lay and collect Taxes, Duties, Imposts and Excises, to pay the
Debts and provide for the common Defence and general Welfare of
the United States; but all Duties, Imposts and Excises shall be
uniform throughout the United States''
The online version has been corrected to read: By Mr. COMER
H.R. 26 Congress has the power to enact this legis-lation pursuant
to the following: Clause l of Section 8 of Article 1--``The
Congress shall have Power To lay and collect Taxes, Duties,
Imposts and Excises, to pay the Debts and provide for the common
Defence and general Welfare of the United States; but all Duties,
Imposts and Excises shall be uniform throughout the United
States''
========================= END NOTE =========================
[Page H51]
title: Construction Consensus Procurement Improvement Act of 2021
